name: hive-small-file-platform
description: Hive小文件治理平台 - 统一管理和监控Hive集群小文件问题

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && node test-dashboard-integration.js"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:hooks && npm run dashboard
scripts.setup:hooks: git config core.hooksPath .githooks && chmod +x .githooks/pre-commit && chmod +x scripts/update-dashboard.sh
scripts.validate: npm run dashboard && echo '✅ 验证通过 - 测试仪表板已更新'

author: Hive Team
